title: Literally Taking the Ticket
author: VD
content_html:
ITEM: He is one of the most sought after artists in the agency world and now he finally has major a booking team behind him. Oliver Anthony has signed with UTA for exclusive worldwide representation in all areas.

ITEM: United Talent Agency is a global talent agency based in Beverly Hills, California. Established in 1991, it represents artists and other professionals across the entertainment industry. As of 2021, the company has more than 1,400 global employees.

Let’s see your shocked faces, everyone.

DISCUSS ON SG
content_text:
ITEM:
He is one of the most sought after artists in the agency world and now he finally has major a booking team behind him. Oliver Anthony has signed with UTA for exclusive worldwide representation in all areas.

United Talent Agency is a global talent agency based in Beverly Hills, California. Established in 1991, it represents artists and other professionals across the entertainment industry. As of 2021, the company has more than 1,400 global employees.
